remarks: Absorption of a redundant conjunct in the intersection of a class abstraction.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jul-2005.)
statement:
intabs.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
intabs.2 $e |- ( x = |^| { y | ps } -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
intabs.3 $e |- ( |^| { y | ps } C_ A /\ ch ) $.
intabs $p |- |^| { x | ( x C_ A /\ ph ) } = |^| { x | ph } $.
$d A x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
